title: Cheap TV deal: Samsung's 65-inch 4K TV drops to a stunningly low price of $498
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: This Samsung TV deal beats the Black Friday price
article: If you're on the hunt for holiday TV deals, then you're in luck. We've just spotted this stunning Samsung 65-inch Crystal 4K TV on sale for just $498 (was $648) at Walmart. That's the lowest price we've ever seen and $50 less than the Black Friday price. If you're looking for a smaller display, Walmart also has the 55-inch Samsung model on sale for $378 (was $499), which beats the Black Friday deal by a whopping $80. The Samsung 7 Series set is loaded with premium features, and today's record-low price is one of the best cheap TV deals we've spotted this month. For just $498, you're getting a stunning display thanks to the 4K Crystal processor that delivers crisp images with bright, brilliant colors. You're also getting smart capabilities powered by Tizen for seamless navigation and Auto Game Mode for a super smooth gaming experience.
